description: Inuyama is the leader of the Rez Boa Dogs, they are forced into battle with Ikki due to interference by Simca. His team is defeated and disbanded and he continues to support Ikki afterwards. Inuyama is a close friend of Gonzou, and he wears a helmet shaped like the head of a Doberman dog. He slams his opponents with the tip of his helmet (or sometimes just with his impossibly hard hair), doing surprisingly major damage.
name: Inuyama
